name: mobile_web_apps_project
description:
Name: Adi Feiner

ID: 204009203

Instructions

First thing you need to register or to login to the app - If you are not registered to the website you need to register and then you can login to your ideas list. If you already registered, you can move to the login page and login to your ideas list. While you login, you can add, edit or remove ideas from the list. 30 minutes after your last used, you will move to the register page.

What was challenging?

Learn to work with cookies

What was fun?

Make the app work and to see the whole flow works and play with the app. It's really cool!
